website_summaries.verdict: Strong tape that stays in place during long exercise sessions or when wet.
pros: Good adhesive for remaining in place
doesn't leave a residue when you remove it
Tape helps with pain in joints, muscles, tendons
Provides good level of performance vs. other brands
cons: Can cause skin irritation and blisters if not applied properly

customer_reviews.title: Use for instant breast lift!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for giving my tatas a lift in a jumpsuit w plunging neckline that I couldn't wear a bra with. Worked great! If you do this, make sure to use pasties to protect the nips so you're not applying this super adhesive tape directly onto them.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Nishimoto

customer_reviews.title: great support and most waterproof I've found
customer_reviews.text: I've got wrist tendonitis. I've tried 4 other products. this is the only one that stood up to hand washing. It provided great support and my wrist felt great in no time. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: fafromnormal

customer_reviews.title: If you need tape to stay on longer than 24-48 hours...
customer_reviews.text: This tape was a buy after I had sweated off tape placed by my PT about 3 hours after application :( I also purchased from a sporting goods store KT tape extreme - peeled off in about 6 hours (humidity/sweat) This tape stayed from Thursday afternoon application until Monday morning (outdoor and indoor exercise and normal activities) and even then I had to soak in the bathtub for about 15-20 minutes to SLOWLY remove it. If you need tape to stay on through your exercise THIS IS THE TAPE FOR YOU!!! I bought a box of it for my PT lol
customer_reviews.author: vhostess

customer_reviews.title: Weird color not Beige
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE- Already peeling after a quick shower without getting soap on it. Clearly not as the box shows “water resistant”. Since I have to wear 25/7 I Will be returning. Just got it today. Will see after first shower about the adhesion. Doesn’t seem to have retention/ stretch/ pull as well as the brand my physical therapist uses. The Beige is as Weird “Trump Tan” orange. Wish I would have just ordered white. Thought it would be skin tone like what I’m used to.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: It works really well for rotator cuff tear
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stuff. I apply this to my sisters shoulder, so it’s pretty easy. Not sure how a person could do it themselves, though I did see a YouTube video on self application (different brand), so I guess it’s possible. I wasn’t able to download the instruction booklet, but the Company was very quick to get back to me & sent a link to the pdf. They were great.
customer_reviews.author: willisforbes

customer_reviews.title: Fairly decent.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job. The beige color tap is quite transparent for work purposes, but still people notice it when close up. The manual has fairly good instructions, but it didn't have more specific instructions that distinguish between top or bottom wrist pains. The tape itself got wet and peeled off easily when I washed my hands, so I needed to be extra careful. After five days, the strip still sticks on nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: amazingly helpful
customer_reviews.text: I find this kind of product extremely useful when my knees are acting up and I want to work out. it is easy to use, though a bit difficult to cut with a scissors, and it can peel off sometimes by itself, but then, it is not difficult to remove when you are done with it. One applications usually lasts for several days. I find the pain relief almost magical.
customer_reviews.author: I. Rubin

customer_reviews.title: like a band-aid
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to relieve some tension for my tendinitis. I notice that people complain about their skin being peeled off from the adhesive etc... well, you're not doing it right if it tears your skin. You are not meant to pull it off fast, like a band-aid. The best way to remove this tape is to soak it in warm water (or coconut oil) before carefully and slowly peeling it off. If you swell or get a rash from it, then you are simply allergic to the adhesive. This is the same tape my physical therapist uses. It's no miracle, but it definitely helps with the healing process! Thanks for the communication and wonderful product Physix!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Levin

customer_reviews.title: I use the tape quite regularly and it helps but...
customer_reviews.text: I like this tape and use it quite regularly. But I am giving it 3 stars because the adhesive more often than not lifts up on the sides (see image) within half an hour of application or upon walking a little. even after lightly rubbing it in to warm it up so it will stick better. I don't know if the issue is because of a one-off roll, or if that's the adhesive quality. Guess I am going to shop around a bit more. I like KT tape, but I think they are expensive for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Subbu Parameswaran

customer_reviews.title: Makes an AWESOME bra!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I used this tape to basically create a bra for myself for a dress that had too low of a neckline for a regular bra (I'm a 34G so adhesive bras are a no-go). Here's how to do it: Start with a strip in the center of each breast, adhering it to the underside. Gently lift and then stick the rest down when you've achieved the kind of life you want. Then, use two or more strips on each side of that center piece of tape until you have the smooth/round shape you want. I recommend putting on the garment every so often so you can make sure the tape isn't showing as you go!
customer_reviews.author: Ktritch6

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I put this on, and 10 hours later started to feel pain where I put the tape. I started to take it off and screamed. It left blisters and welps all up and down my arm, shoulders and back. I alsmot went to the emergency room. It will take days to get rid of these welps and blisters. How dare you sell this crap here. I should report you to the FCC and sue you!
customer_reviews.author: lukeskywalker7

customer_reviews.title: Physix Tape
customer_reviews.text: I have used a half a dozen different tapes in the past few years and the Physix Tape is by far the best. I've run, stretched, and weight lifted with it. Hopefully, things will improve in our country very soon and the health club will reopen and I can swim with it.
customer_reviews.author: L A  Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tape!
customer_reviews.text: I had knee surgery and one of my physical therapists suggested I use kinesiology tape to stabilize my knee and to aid in the swelling. I purchased the Physix brand first and it's awesome. The tape adheres tightly and stays on through several showers. In the photo the Physix brand is tan and on the right side. I have another brand (white) on the left. As you can see the left side is peeling off - after just 6 hours from applying it. I definitely recommend the Physix brand!
customer_reviews.author: Mama P

customer_reviews.title: GEAR SPORTS KIN TAPE IS AMAZING.. BEST TAPE I HAVE EVER USED ON ...
customer_reviews.text: GEAR SPORTS KIN TAPE IS AMAZING.. BEST TAPE I HAVE EVER USED ON WOUNDS. I HAVE AN INCISIONAL HERNIA AND CANNOT HAVE REPAIR UNTIL FALL, NOTHING I USED WORKED, I HAVE USED THIS NOW FOR A WEEK, 3 , 5 INCH PIECES AND HOLDS WELL AND PREVENTS PROTRUSION.. BELTS AND VELCRO ARE OK, I SUGGEST TRYING THIS FOR SMALL HERNIA.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Dabney  Ware

customer_reviews.title: So helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is the only thing that provides relief for my shoulder. I need to order more. Left a sticky residue on my skin but it washed off in the shower quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I got a 1-pack in beige to help with physical therapy for an old knee injury. The product quality is really great! The tape is easy to use and I have had my current set of tape on through two showers and the edges are barely even affected! I will definitely be coming back to buy more of this when my roll runs out. Additionally, the two ebooks available are from a choice of five. I appreciated having options rather than potentially being given a book that is not necessary for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Micaiah

customer_reviews.title: Used for neck and shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: I did have to find some other photo tutorials to use as I couldn't find the email with the instruction guide. Easy to use, easy to tear (don't be afraid to tear it all the way across! The tape itself won't rip!). I use it for neck pain and it has lasted me 3 days so far with little wear. I can tell it makes a difference as I wake up with minimal neck pain instead of the horrible pain I used to wake up with! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've tried different brands and they all pretty much work equally well
customer_reviews.text: I have a minor tear of the meniscus, I opted against surgery. I find using Kinesio tape when I exercise really helps. I've tried different brands and they all pretty much work equally well. BUT, Physix stays on the longest. This last application I finally took it off after 3 days through workouts and baths and showers, though it probably could've stayed on another day or two. The best part is there's no skin irritation. Other brands I've tried would give me skin irritation, some even after just one application.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett T

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Recently, my daughter (age 46) used this on a little finger that she has torn the ligaments and tendons and it really worked, so I thought I'd try it. I haven't used it as yet, but I thinking it will be great.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I love this tape
customer_reviews.text: I love this tape! I purchased it because I have a weak ankle. I work out 5-6 days a week in many different activities. I’m also training for an obstacle race this May and need to maintain fitness and stamina. This tape has helped me maintain my workout schedule and prevented further injury. My ankle felt worse when working out without the tape, and I needed a lot more recovery/down time. I sticks to your skin even after it is wet. It stayed on securely after several showers. I love how this tape provides the support, but it flush to your skin, so it still feels so comfortable when you have your sneaker on (unlike a support sleeve).
customer_reviews.author: KirbyStone

customer_reviews.title: Very sticky stuff, remove with caution.
customer_reviews.text: I used this tape to help flatten and soften the keiloid scar left after my open heart surgery. It sticks really well. I would caution against ripping it off. I hold the edge of the tape and gently work my skin away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby from MO

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This tape was purchased as a gift for my friend who has been having issues with her knee. She was frustrated because she couldn't find anything but black locally, and didn't like the looks of it. So that's why I found your beige K-tape on Amazon and got it for her. She was very happy to receive it! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jo Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tape, I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tape, I highly recommend it. I use for my toddler's Torticollis. Does not hurt him when it comes off and stays on really well. Also does not irritate his skin and many other brands do. I do have to press down for about 5 seconds to get part of it to stick which allows me to pull and stretch it to the desired spot (I think that's normal anyway). But as soon as it does, the remainder goes on without issue and stays in place.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin E Warren

customer_reviews.title: Works for me a PT!
customer_reviews.text: I am a physical therapist who had a total knee replacement six years ago. I have also a lot of scarring on the knee due to severe burns 11 years ago. I developed symptoms of popping in the lateral Retinaculum area but most of the scaring was on the medial aspect of the knee. I felt that this area was what was precipitating the dysfunction. After application with the tape on the medial aspect, it immediately resolved the difficulty. I have been using it continuously for the last two weeks without any reoccurrence of the effusion. GOOD STUFF!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: I did no research before my kinesiology tape purchase and only went by others research and reviews on Amazon. All I know is I had a hip problem from over pronation of my foot. I applied the tape using instructions I found online and my hip problem is mitigated. I bought the beige tape so it would blend in but I found it is a bit difficult to see well when I'm applying to myself. It is sticking to me perfectly and has not peeled up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice Color - Lack Adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these type of tapes for quite sometime. Bought this as I can control the length to my specifications. It works ok and provides support if you follow guidelines. Unfortunately, the adhesive doesn't last. Even following the instructions, the tape adhesive was failing, corners were lifting everywhere. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: OSE

customer_reviews.title: Great for temporary use!
customer_reviews.text: In April, I sprain my wrist and thumb at work. Doctor recommended a thumb splint to wear while at work. As of this review, I still have not received the splint. So, I use the kinesiology tape instead. It helps to relieve any stress or pressure on my wrist. And I make sure that I don't lift heavy objects.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. P-G

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but had reaction
customer_reviews.text: Out of the tapes I’ve tried (Strength Tape, KT Tape) this one stayed on the longest, but still peeled after two full days. I also had some sort of skin reaction to it, which wasn’t too big a deal at first, but it took over two weeks to heal up. I’d apply some sort of base tape first before putting this directly on your skin.
customer_reviews.author: kostratton

customer_reviews.title: Good pain relief, trouble with adhesion.
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble getting this to stay put and I wouldn’t really call it waterproof. However, I am using small pieces on my hand, which moves so much. So it may be where I’m using it vs the product. It really helps my pain when it’s on.
customer_reviews.author: Korina Flint

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly very pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m calling this “ magic tape”!! I put it on my knee (I’m 44 and tweaked it super bad running) and it helped almost immediately!! I was having trouble simply walking without pain. I tried numerous pain meds (Advil and aleve...oils...nothing overly strong) but this was the one thing that made a HUGE difference. I will be ordering more!! Surprisingly Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Physix Gear Sport Kinesiology Tape
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works better than expected. Alleviates pain and increases range of motion. I am able to do light exercise using the affected muscles. Highly recommend for anyone that, for whatever reason, ends up with sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ison

customer_reviews.title: Knee stability
customer_reviews.text: Stays on well if you trim the edges like it tells you to. Helps to stabilize my knee and helps me to remember not to twist the wrong way Easy to remove when ready. I just soap it up good in the shower and pull
customer_reviews.author: Terry Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have shin splints and when it flares up I’m in terrible pain.. this tape worked amazingly. I was still able to work out every day and it seemed my pain went away sooner than it normally does. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works great for adhesion
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tape. The adhesion is awesome . Its also waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Sticks and Stays
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I had been using an extreme version of another brand that would rub off after one day in jeans. This is skin colored and lasts for 3 days. It loses some of its tension, but it stays in place through showers and working out.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Good tape but backing should be split
customer_reviews.text: Great kinesiotape, just wish the paper backing was split up the middle to make it a little easier to remove. Stays on for a long time as long as you're careful never to touch the sticky side --- I've had this strip on for at least five days, and it's still giving me support. I used Leukotape for many years for a chronic knee (patella) problem, but I'm finding the kinesiotape much easier to use, and this brand seems a good choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: T L.

customer_reviews.title: I like this for several reasons
customer_reviews.text: I like this for several reasons. It's biege so it's not so noticible. I wear it everyday to keep my shoulder stable, it has a torn rotator cuff, and is the only thing that helps it. It doesn't itch like the others I've tried or start raveling after a day. So far so good. Nice product and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Helen GriffisTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by free ebook.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be fooled by the free ebook, especially if you are looking for a guide on how to apply for a certain ailment. Have been trying to access it for the last10 minutes without any success.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tape for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried Physix tape, KT tape and Rock tape. Physix tape is my go to tape after trying all three. I don't feel like the KT tape offered as much support as the Physix and Rock tape. I have no complaints about the Rock tape and it did seem to be a little thicker, but at almost twice the price it wasn't a significant difference at all. The Physix tape adhears well...when wearing it on my back it was still stuck after three days which included 2 workouts and 3 showers. When I wear it on my arm for tennis elbow I remove it everyday. A great tape at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great option to steer away from using a brace
customer_reviews.text: Doctor suggested we try this for my son's knee that was retaining water from a basketball injury. Seems to be helping. Swelling has reduced and knee cap has not displaced since putting k-tape on. Our doctor was very specific about how to put the tape on, where to put it on, and how much tape to use. We will continue using it. Really like the color options. The neutral was a great choice for us since my son didn't want attention drawn to the injury.
customer_reviews.author: buckeye15

customer_reviews.title: Love me some KTAPE!
customer_reviews.text: After having a physical therapy session, I have been a huge fan of KTape when it comes to my knees. I will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Got me hooked on Kinesiology tape
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as my first introduction to kinesiology tape and I am hooked. It really helps with my back and ankle pain. Now that I've tried other brands, I'm not sure I see any difference between the brands I've tried, but I'm convinced that kinesiology tape definitely helps relieve my pain. This particular brand comes with an e-book on how to use it, so its a good brand to start with if you aren't sure how to use the tape.
customer_reviews.author: Wiwse

customer_reviews.title: Burned my skin!
customer_reviews.text: Ripped off my skin! Not sure if it’s a chemical burn or what, but after less than 24 hours I noticed a pain on my very pregnant belly. When I took a look it had taken off a layer of skin! I removed all of it as soon as I could. Used another brand with last pregnancy and did NOT have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I am buyer's wife. I ordered the tape for my mom for the second time. The first time she used it, we found it beneficial. The best thing about it is non-irritating towards the skin and its stickyness lasts longer with good adhesion. We use it for my mom's Rheumatoid Arthritis. We are satisfied with the product. I dont think we will ever use any other tape apart from this one for my mom's medical purpose. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mubashir hussaini

customer_reviews.title: Better than KT or Rock tape
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kinesiology tape I have found. In terms of adhesion if you sweat
customer_reviews.author: LadyDoc rider AZ

customer_reviews.title: Physix Kinesiology Tape - Same as the PT used + excellent service
customer_reviews.text: The Physix kinesiology tape is exactly what my physical therapist gave me, but with more color options. I love that they even send you instructions explaining how to cut the corners to prevent fraying and tips for how to apply it. All of it matched what my PT suggested, but it's nice to have it in front of you. Plus, if you have questions about it, you can actually contact the seller and they'll help you out. It's kinda cool.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Tape that stops pain
customer_reviews.text: This tape is a life saver. I have fibromyalgia and always have back pain. For year I would use products like Ben gay or bio freeze to ease the pain but because of the smell I would stay home. The tape supports me and there is no odor
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Damaged my skin
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely sticky. It pulled on my skin so bad that it made my skin blister and then tear. When it was time to take it off in the shower it was so painful because of the blisters I formed from the tape.
customer_reviews.author: Codi Rae

customer_reviews.title: Really sticks!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kinesiology tape I have used. It actually stays in place for days and days. I usually have to take it off after 2 weeks because it’s lost it’s elasticity. Other brands I’ve tried would last 5 days tops. This tape is the best and I will continue to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Good for face protection
customer_reviews.text: Currently using this product to protect my face from the abrasion of wearing a mask every day. I wear a 3 inch strip on my nose and have not had any adverse reactions. Stays well even when heavily sweating.
customer_reviews.author: mike valente

customer_reviews.title: Great for onsens
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a less common reason than most, to cover up tattoos in Japanese onsens. To this extent it works well as it is not transparent, sticks well underwater and allows for cutting up and using in difficult places (joints).
customer_reviews.author: mauvar19

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff! Long lasting and works great. Provides great support and stability.
customer_reviews.text: First time using tape and amazed how much greater stability it provides to my injured shoulder. Each application has lasted a full week despite daily showers. I will definitely order more. Great stuff. I haven't tried any other brands, but why should I when this works so well and is priced competively.
customer_reviews.author: WAG

customer_reviews.title: Avoid if you have latex allergy, otherwise it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I could cut to the length I needed - they’re not pre-cut. Went on easily, stayed on a couple of days, came off easily in the shower when I wanted to remove it. The downside: there must be some latex in this. I had a skin reaction to it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply; adds stability
customer_reviews.text: The e-guide was helpful, and quite specific to user's need. Product arrived quickly; good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: eal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tape.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have tape that can be cut to fit. Just round off the corners with scissors to prevent corners from snagging and getting pulled up by clothing. Works for me similar to an Ace bandage, but much thinner and comfortable. The Ace will give more support however, unless more KT tape than a single wrap is used. Seems good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Getting old is not good bunions is just the beginning thank you again
customer_reviews.text: The products seems to be just fine I was using it for bunions to separate the toes and after 5 or 6 tries I think I got it so it seems to be doing the job thank you I appreciate it
customer_reviews.author: DIXIE Q.r

customer_reviews.title: Nope nope.
customer_reviews.text: I did a 24hr skin test first and made out just fine. My first use, half of it rolled off from sweat. My second use, I felt no physical improvement, and when I attempted to remove in the recommended manor, it did indeed tear a good amount of skin off. Ouch.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaT

customer_reviews.title: Tape helps arm pain - and comes in Colors!
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist was using this type of tape on my sore forearm. I am a technical writer and need to use a mouse and keyboard for at least 8 hours a day. The tape has helped to reduce the pain so much and Physix Gear even sent me an eBook so I can apply the tape at home. I especially like that I can get it in beige, so it doesn't show through my clothing. Thank you! I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: DMM

customer_reviews.title: Thinner and doesn't last as long as other brands of KT tape
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as other KT tapes on the market. Only lasts a day or two at most. It's less expensive than other KT brands so I thought I'd give it a try. It's ok but I'll probably continue to buy the more popular brands (KT tape and Rock tape) even though they are more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: GivingBack

customer_reviews.title: irritates
customer_reviews.text: i bought it for my shoulder pain, first day i just loved the product i felt less pain in gym and lift heavyer however second day started to have irritation and when i took it off my skinn was like burnd-up with water
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good grip. Been using it for 3 days now and while it takes a bit to dry after I shower, the tape is still intact and not peeling off. I can barely feel it but can see a difference in my back. Great product. Planning on buying more tapes for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar E

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: works great, i didnt activate the book while it was available and the window for it should be longer
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I use this tape to correct my large toe due to a bad bunion. By correcting the position of the toe it has eased the pain and allowed me to wear shoes that previously hurt.
customer_reviews.author: K. London

customer_reviews.title: Very Thankful for this tape
customer_reviews.text: I never thought this tape could help my pain the way it does. I can't order enough, I'm afraid to run out of it like I did recently. It truly helps stabilize my ankles and takes my pain to a complete new level. I just told my foot Dr. Its the only thing that has helped me so far. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Leaty

customer_reviews.title: Kinesiology Tape
customer_reviews.text: Fast ship. Professional packaging. Does it really work? it is in the person's mind. Great product, Recommend highly. Anthony. H. Burlington.MA.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY HAMBOYAN

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions for using the tape
customer_reviews.text: Great instructions for using the tape; will report back after several days but certainly like the dedication of the company.
customer_reviews.author: Fletcher's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: I developed mommy's thumb and couldn't get into the acupuncturist for a month so I bought this. Wore it about 3 days and the pain has lessened by 70 percent! I'm on the mend and shouldn't need to go to the acupuncturist!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought that they had not sent the books that were promised. I came to find out that my wife had pulled out the paper insert with the information to retrieve the books from the box. The books were downloaded and the product is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: This tape has really helped my knee, but it’s really important to follow the directions given on how to apply it. I messed it up the first time, because I didn’t follow the directions perfectly. The second time was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Batt

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The customer support has been amazing for Physix Gear Kinesiology Tape. Upon arrival of the product, Adam (the founder) checked to make sure I was happy with their product. I had misplaced the instructions for the eGuide (showing ideal placement of this tape). Adam quickly sent a pdf of the eGuide to me. I am very impressed with his support and prompt attention! The tape works great. I definitely encourage you to buy this product. I am very happy with our purchase!!! Please tell your friends to try it too.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Luna

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with the immediate pain relief this tape gave to my knee and ankle which lasted for hours. The tape is easy to separate from the backing and adhered well to my skin. It stayed on until I removed it the following day. Even the removal was easy and painless. I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must to buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to tape that has replaced my big heavy knee braces. It is so sweat proof and water proof.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Christian

customer_reviews.title: Free guide- sham
customer_reviews.text: I can’t apply product until I go to site and download guide- 7 day exp. The directions are not clear and I’ll use other online resources for instructions. DO NOT PAY EXTRA FOR “free” GUIDE.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Fraley

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend for anyone to try
customer_reviews.text: I have had conic pain in my shoulder for some time. I have had surgery on it. As long as you put the tape on right it has made a lot of difference. You can go on line and find all different way to put on for the area that you have pain. I would recommend for anyone to try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Kinesiology Tape I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This Kinesiology tape is without any doubt in my mind the best I have used! I have a couple ribs that regularly slip out of the sternum! This tape sticks and stretch’s perfectly and helps pull my ribs back in! I highly recommend this Kinesiology tape to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: clon

customer_reviews.title: Great tape product on a roll!
customer_reviews.text: Actually am using the tape to create a barrier on the back of my heels so as not to get more blisters. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very responsive seller
customer_reviews.text: I have hoping to get the instructional booklet and wrote an rating looking for a response. It came right away, including the PDF files I could not access. Excellent service, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just did not stick as long as other products, but work very well besides sleeping
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn Kisker

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stick!!!
customer_reviews.text: Poor tape. Does not stick. I have been a certified KT practitioner for more than 10 years. I know how to apply KT tape and have not had problems with other brands. Unfortunately, this tape does not stick for more than 2 hours- which thus provides zero therapeutic effect and a huge waste of money. The company just sends a prefabricated response to ways the tape should be applied when i contacted them. They never addressed the underlying issue. Don't waste you time, money, effort, etc with this tape. Buy KinesioTex tape instead. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stick, helpful for shoulder muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: I used this for shoulder pain during and after my workouts. It stayed stuck for the workout and after a shower. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian

customer_reviews.title: Best quality K-Tape by far!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different bands of Kinesiology tape and this is by far the best brand I've used. It sticks very well and doesn't peel off like other brands. The E-book/guide is very helpful on teaching you how to apply the tape on every kind of injury. Best quality, best stickiness, and best instructions!!
customer_reviews.author: Colby Marler

customer_reviews.title: Received product quickly in excellent packaging. Husband is using tape to support muscle ...
customer_reviews.text: Received product quickly in excellent packaging. Husband is using tape to support muscle in upper quad and has been an excellent source that has decreased the pain he had been experiencing. The e book was a great helped in demonstrating how best to apply this kinesiology tape. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Athletic tape
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this tape over knee compression sleeves because you can place it exactly where you need it most. I will buy again because I find it superior to other tapes.
customer_reviews.author: hotmommom

customer_reviews.title: Sticks well
customer_reviews.text: The tape works very well. It takes the edge of the pain if you use the correct tape pattern but it didn't work for me as well as others claim it has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t as long lasting as KT tape
customer_reviews.text: I went by the Amazon reviews that said this brand of tape stuck better than KT brand but it lasts just 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: David M Szakacs

customer_reviews.title: Great product with benefits
customer_reviews.text: I only discovered kinesiology tape recently. It's made a huge difference for the better on the painful carpal tunnel in my wrist. I feel it eases the slight swelling and makes movement easier. Also, the excellent illustrations in the free ebook download are a big help in learning how to best use the tape.
customer_reviews.author: Escondido

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT SELF BANDAGE AND PRETTY COLORS TOO.
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. They stick to each other when you're finished wrapping around your wrist or finger or knee or whatever you want to do with them. Very cool product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie H

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for plus size maternity belly support
customer_reviews.text: Used this in place of a maternity belt I am 31 weeks pregnant and was starting to need additional support. I am plus size so was apprehensive of the tape adhering but am using it for the first time today and felt instant relief. I was still able to use my regular lotion and belly butter and no issues with it not sticking. Very glad I purchased. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kinesiology tape really works!
customer_reviews.text: Using this to support back muscles after a serious injury and surgery. I can't explain the difference it makes. Recommended by the physical therapist and it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape!
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered K-tape from several companies for many years. This is the first time I order Physix Gear tape and I am very happy with it. The reason I tried this tape was because they also offered a e-book that went with the tape. I was pleasantly surprised by the extra resource. I am excited to try some of there taping techniques.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but...
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, you should soak the tape before taking it off. I did not think it would be necessary, so some of my skin came off with the tape. It does stick and stay in place, though, so I guess I should have realized that it wouldn't come off easily or comfortably. Bottom line: it does the job, but be careful taking it off!
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Taping Works
customer_reviews.text: The tape stays in place and has helped in the healing process of strained muscles. Would recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bokara

customer_reviews.title: Works as Described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tape to use on my shoulder to help a torn rotator cuff. After applying the tape, I noticed less discomfort and more moveability. THANKS!!
customer_reviews.author: Justme6055

customer_reviews.title: But once u have the right spot wow it feel good. My right knee is wore than the left ...
customer_reviews.text: I have chondromalacia patella . the tape held up for 3 days. However I used skin prep first wait until it dryed then applied the tape. U don't need a lot and it dose take pratacice. But once u have the right spot wow it feel good. My right knee is wore than the left knee. But the left knee felt 100% better the right knee about 80% better. ( I did not place it well again need more practice). I can all ways use my brace over it and now 100% of full use. Hope this help.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: I got exactly what was described but I will say ...
customer_reviews.text: I got exactly what was described but I will say that it left a bit of a "razor burn" on my leg when taking it off. I will still continue to use it just be advised that you either need to have a very close shave when applying the tape and you'll probably get an even closer one when you take it off.
customer_reviews.author: A. Herzog

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My physical therapist recommended this for my neck and shoulder pain. I have been going to different chiropractors for 20 years trying to fix the pain. I was skeptical that tape would make a difference, as I thought it was the white athletic tape I used to see athletes in high school use. The tape helped alleviate the pain within a few minutes. I can shower without it coming off and can usually wear it for about 5 days. This product has helped improve the quality of my life immensely!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Painful blisters and poor adhesive
customer_reviews.text: Tape would roll up and wouldn’t stick at the ends. It resulted in painful blisters. Definitely would not recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Far Superior Choice
customer_reviews.text: I've used Rock Tape and KT tape for years and found this superior to both especially when you consider the much more attractive price point. I just spent 3 days golfing in heavy down pours and had both elbows taped up. Not only do my elbows feel great but the tape is still holding on great! This is all I plan to buy from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Albert K.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to heal a torn calf muscle and this simply isn't thick or sturdy enough to do much. It's probably my fault in that I don't know which tape would work best, but this was too lightweight and curled easily
customer_reviews.author: C. Conant

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Stuck really well to my knees hrough my whole 3 mile run, but I think my knees are just to bad for taping. Great product overall. I think I will try it for my ankles during long runs
customer_reviews.author: Marla

product_meta.title: Physix Gear Sport Kinesiology Athletic Tape - Sports Injury Tape for Knee, Joint, Muscle Support - Adhesive Kinetic Tape/KT Tape - Improve Blood Circulation, Swelling, Pain Relief
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :3.5 x 3.1 x 2 inches; 1.76 Ounces
 * Date First Available :October 22, 2015
 * Manufacturer :Physix Gear Sport
 * ASIN :B01702TM8Q

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #7,047 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household)  *  #12 inKinesiology Recovery Tapes 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars670 ratings
feature_bullets: RELIABILITY IN A BOX — Go that extra mile with our kinetic tape. Made with 4 way Stretch Fabric, Feel the quality as its applied.

STAYS ON EVEN WHEN YOU SHOWER – Does Your K tape falls off? Leaves residues? NOT with Physix Gear Sport Kinesiology Tapes. Sticks for days – even after sweaty runs or yoga sessions. It’s so comfy, you won’t even feel it’s there

NO TAPE DANGLING. Our muscle tape is made for running, resting, swimming, working, or recovering. No other tape is as easy to cut, stick and peel. No dangling fabrics & No stress when removing from skin

WE WON'T LEAVE YOU CLUELESS — New to kinesthetic tape? Get exclusive access to our 82-page illustrated Physix Tape eGuide for FREE. It contains illustrated basic & advanced tips on how to use and remove, plus other safety precautions for optimum comfort and muscle support

MORE THAN JUST TAPE – You’re not buying just runners tape in each purchase. We’re giving you peace of mind with our MONEY BACK Guarantee & full-time assistance with our 24/7 customer support service. The ultimate value to customer and more!
